g.title: Natural uranium ore is extracted from the ground at the mine. The enrichment plant increases the concentration of U-235 in the natural uranium up to around 4 percent.
This is a regular reactor, of which there are about 100 of in the USA. It is water cooled and requires enriched uranium.
This is enriched Uranium, with about 4 percent U-235 and the rest U-238.
In a once through cycle, the waste goes straight into a waste repository, where it is supposed to stay for up to a million years.
When the reactor runs for a few years, the waste is made up of depleted uranium (with very little U-235 left), plutonium and other actinides, and the fission products.
